info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 03 at 6:01PM CDT until October 03 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR WESTERN SCURRY AND EASTERN BORDEN COUNTIES... At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gail, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Gail Mesonet reported a 73 mph wind gust at 554 PM CDT. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Snyder, Gail, Fluvanna, J B Thomas Reservoir, Dunn, Randalls Corner, Winston Field, Ira, and Knapp. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
